bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon main frame, seatstay & chainstay, removable Carbon Armor, ABP Convert, E2 fully integrated tapered head tube, BB95, Flow Mold carbon swing link, internal control routing, internal shock routing, Micro Truss, G2 Geometry, 100mm travel
